Detailed Description

Keyboard driver with interrupt support

This class is a subclass of Gate and implements the interrupt routine used for the keyboard.

void Keyboard::plugin (  ) 

storage for fetched keys

Todo:
write declaration

enable the interrupt mechanism of the keyboard

Todo:
write implementation

Method plugin() enables all keyboard interrupts. After calling plugin() interrupts activated by the keyboard are recognised.
